Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Jg7904.t1 (defensin, 3S=S, UCSS1a; natural AMPs; insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: bioinformatic predicted from the black soldier fly,Hermetia illucens

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (32.53%) toOh-defensinC: 10%. GRAVY: 0.156; mol Wt: 8651.103; mol formula: C379H595N93O114S10; mol ex coeff: 4970.Activity: inhibited the growth of Gram- P. aeruginosa PAO1, the Gram-positive species B. thuringiensis, B. megaterium QM B1551 and B. cereus ATCC 14579 compared to the control. Bacteriocidal.Recombinant production:bacteria:Escherichia coli: expressed in the BL21 (DE3) construct containing an N-terminal 6xHis tag, and SUMO solubility tag as in soulble inclusion bodies.Structure: predicted by alphafold 2 to have a combined alpha and beta structures. GW
Literature Information.Author: Fahmy L, Generalovic T, Ali YM, Seilly D, Sivanesan K, Kalmar L, Pipan M, Christie G, Grant AJ. 2024
Literature Information.Title: A novel family of defensin-like peptides from Hermetia illucens with antibacterial properties.
